==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|みなみ|はん|きゅう|yomi=y}}

===Etymology===
[[南]] ([[みなみ]], [[minami]]): [[South]] + [[半球]] ([[はんきゅう]], [[hankyū]]): [[hemisphere]]

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|みなみはんきゅう}}

# [[Southern Hemisphere]] - The hemisphere of the [[Earth]] (or any [[celestial]] body) to the south of its equator.

====Antonyms====
* {{ja-r|北半球|きたはんきゅう|kitahankyū}}: [[Northern Hemisphere]]

====Related terms====
* [[地球]] ([[ちきゅう]], [[Chikyū]]): [[Earth]]
* [[天体]] ([[てんたい]], [[tentai]]): [[celestial body]]
